QuestData.Title: The Durnholde Challenge: Bloodvenom
QuestData.Description: According to the guide, Bloodvenom is your next challenge. The fearsome elemental can be found on the lower level of Durnholde Keep, near the western prisons.
QuestData.RewardText: Now you know why the monster was called Bloodvenom. What challenges remain?$B$B<You open the guide that Jekyll gave to you.>
